name: Chess Soccer
description:
Play soccer using chess pieces. 

When the ball is grabbed, the piece can kick it in the same way they move. Pass it between pieces and try to score into the net!

First player to 3 goals wins!

Play in browser at: https://sweazey48.itch.io/chess-soccer-webgl !

Credits

Developers: Renzy Alarcon (XeroKimo), Wesley Sweazey (sweazey48)

Sounds: Hit Mic01 by Inkington (Freesound.org), Referee Whistle by Tommon (Freesound.org), dragging-chess-pieces-on-the-chess-board by biancabothapure (Freesound.org), soccer-kicks by padpad, playing-chess by sunejackie

8Bit Sounds: Wesley Sweazey (Bfxr_WIN)

Music: funnysong by bensound
